title: (x) Where the action is... - Anzeigen Grotesk {Mark S}
content:
I'm trying to identify this font. Any suggestions?   
   
 ![vintage font](http://web.archive.org/web/20051122160555im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47338.jpg)
author: acrossthedesert

comments.content: It looks like Impact back slanted to me.

Eduardo was on the right track. There is a face similar to Aurora called [Anzeigen Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20051122160555/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/anzeigen-grotesk/ef/testdrive.html?s=where%a0the%a0action%a0is&p=48), and I'm pretty sure that's what it is. Certain characters are different (M, W, w, V, v, A) but otherwise they are almost identical.
\> Wow, that was some quick help. Thanks guys.
